2164.subject: GS
2164.course_title_long: Religion in a Post Secular World
2164.descrlong: We now live in a "post-secular" world.  We will cover the nature and debates of the "post secular" -  what it means and how we arrived here.  This course will cover the politics of pluralism, differing church-state relations and religious debates on rights - of nature, sexuality, life, practice, sovereignty, and economic well-being.  (Credit/ No Credit Available)
